item.title: ABOUT
item.description: My name is Christian Loerner. Welcome to my blog. My carrier at VMware started in early 2016 as a Technical Account Manager in the PSO organization. Prior to that I worked as a senior consultant for several business parters here in Germany. At all I have over 16 years of IT experience. Especially in VMware of course! If you want to know what a TAM does, you can follow this link.
